dcterms:creator: Dan Hendrycks
Thomas Dietterich
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset designed to evaluate the robustness of neural networks against common corruptions and perturbations, featuring various types of image corruptions applied to the CIFAR-10 dataset.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10C

dcterms:creator: Dan Hendrycks
Thomas Dietterich
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset similar to CIFAR10C, but based on the CIFAR-100 dataset, used to assess the robustness of neural networks against various corruptions.
dcterms:title: CIFAR100C

dcterms:creator: Dan Hendrycks
Norman Mu
Ekin D Cubuk
Barret Zoph
Justin Gilmer
Balaji Lakshminarayanan
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to evaluate the robustness of models against various corruptions, featuring images from the ImageNet dataset subjected to different types of corruptions.
dcterms:title: Imagenet-C

dcterms:creator: Dan Hendrycks
Norman Mu
Ekin D Cubuk
Barret Zoph
Justin Gilmer
Balaji Lakshminarayanan
dcterms:description: A dataset containing various renditions of ImageNet classes, used to evaluate the robustness of models against different artistic styles and transformations.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-R

dcterms:creator: Kuniaki Saito
Donghyun Kim
Stan Sclaroff
Trevor Darrell
Kate Saenko
dcterms:description: A dataset for semi-supervised domain adaptation, consisting of images from four different domains (real, clipart, painting, sketch) with 126 classes.
dcterms:title: DomainNet-126
